abstract: A judge will consider the hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors’ guilty plea to insider trading charges on Thursday, and JPMorgan will release its first-quarter earnings on Friday.
snippet: A judge will consider the hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors’ guilty plea to insider trading charges on Thursday, and JPMorgan will release its first-quarter earnings on Friday.
lead_paragraph: SAC CAPITAL FADES AWAY AS JUDGE CONSIDERS ITS PLEA

headline.main: SAC Capital Plea and JPMorgan Earnings
headline.print_headline: SAC Capital Plea and JPMorgan Earnings

abstract: Daniel E. Pinto, who two weeks ago became sole chief executive of JPMorgan Chase’s corporate and investment bank, has announced a number of executive shifts within his division.
snippet: Daniel E. Pinto, who two weeks ago became sole chief executive of JPMorgan Chase’s corporate and investment bank, has announced a number of executive shifts within his division.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks ago, Daniel E. Pinto was named the sole chief executive of JPMorgan Chase’s sweeping corporate and investment bank. Now, he is leaving his first major mark on the unit.

headline.main: JPMorgan to Shift Executives at Corporate and Investment Bank

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
